item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/P Engage Switches (L CMD, C CMD, R CMD) One Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated autopilot system is considered inoperative.

numlitem.para: If Autopilot engagement between 250 feet and 500 feet AGL is desired: the pilot will not engage the autopilot unless the Auto Flight Director System being used is fully operational.
Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 2.

placard.para: Placard A/P Engage Switches "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: MODE CONTROL PANEL SWITCHES A/P ENGAGE SWITCHES ONE INOPERATIVE

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Open and collar the FCC servo circuit breaker (P7 panel) for the inoperative FCC:

entry.para: Left L FLT CONT CMPTR SERVO
Center C FLT CONT CMPTR SERVO
Right R FLT CONT CMPTR SERVO

numlitem.para: Before each departure, verify that status message A/P SINGLE SYS is not displayed. If A/P SINGLE SYS is displayed see MEL 22-10-1-3 for dispatch.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
